  • Method Details

    • addTruck

      public void addTruck​(Truck truck) throws TruckersException
      Adds a new truck into the repository.
      Parameters:
      truck - to add.
      Throws:
      TruckersException - if there is already a truck with the same id.

    • getAllTrucks

      public java.util.List<Truck> getAllTrucks()
      Returns all trucks.
      Returns:
      a List consisting of all trucks.

    • deleteTruck

      public void deleteTruck​(int byId)
      Deletes a Truck entity based on the given id.
      Parameters:
      byId - the id by which the truck will be deleted.
      Throws:
      TruckersException - if no truck was found with the specified id.

    • updateTruck

      public void updateTruck​(Truck updatedTruck)
      Updates the truck based on the provided id.
      Parameters:
      updatedTruck - represents the new data for the truck with the specified id.
      Throws:
      TruckersException - if there is no truck with given id.

    • getTrucksByModel

      public java.util.List<Truck> getTrucksByModel​(java.lang.String model)
      Returns a filtered List representing the trucks with the given model.
      Parameters:
      model - minimum available capacity the garage should have.
      Returns:
      a List consisting of filtered trucks.
